name: Be Kind Rewind
description:
Written originally for a Disability and Narrative final project, I decided to add another route (Olivia's route) and turn this into a full story. 

There are Resources on Disability/Media included as part of the story as well; you can access these by using the Director's Commentary link when starting the game. Links in the Director's Commentary go outside the game, may break focus, and the links of course rely on an active Internet connection.

This story is Pay What You Want, but donations encouraged. Art costs time and money and donations allow me to create more content! <3
